name: Kill The Immortals
description:
Controls:

A/D - MOVE LEFT/RIGHT

K - A/JUMP

L-B/ATTACK

You can aim your attack with W and D(midair). 

Kill The Immortals is a short boss rush where you collect the souls and powers of your opponents. There are three bosses in total. Music was made by me in BeepBox, sprites were drawn by my brother in pixilart.com. Soundeffects are recorded from a gameboy and gotten from (https://rhythm-lab.com/gameboy-samples/). Hope you enjoy my second itch game!
